page.title: 19Marion the milk lady.
page.content: Marion Robinson is our local milk lady who lives at Fatten House Farm in Hoddlesden.She is a very kind person & everyone knows her.Marion delivers milk every day of the year,even Christmas Day when we are opening our presents! She welcomes new people to the village with a card & a week of free milk.She keeps an eye on all the old people and takes in their milk & has a chat to them.If they are ill she takes them flowers. Marion is popular with children because she always has sweets and sometimes they get a ride on the van. Marion's house is 200 years old & she has lived there all her life.It is a dairy farm.They have 139 acres & 50 cows.Four people work on the farm & they milk twice a day;6.30am & 4.30pm They deliver to 300 homes in Hoddlesden and Darwen.
